for (int i = 1; i< 3; i++) {
    z += i + 3;
}
\begin{gather*} \vec{x} = [x_1, x_2,\ldots, x_n]\\ \vec{y} = [y_1, y_2,\ldots, y_n]\\ \vec{x} \cdot \vec{y} = \sum_{i=1}^n x_i y_i \end{gather*}
